data.partBlankContent: After the growth phase comes the maturity phase, or a period of time when growth levels off and a peak is reached. data.fullContent: After the growth phase comes the maturity phase, or a period of time when growth levels off and a peak is reached. It is during this phase that the government will typically correct flaws in the market and promote new technologies. The firm can either invest in new ideas or explore ideas in an attempt to speed growth. The market will then play out in response to changes by the government or firm.
data.answer: 在成长阶段之后是成熟期，也就是一段增长平稳并达到顶峰的时期。在这一阶段，政府通常会纠正市场缺陷并推广新技术。公司既可以投资新想法，也可以探索新想法以加速增长。然后市场会对政府或公司的变化做出反应。
